'''Summer''' is a character featured in ''Minecraft'' novels by [[wikipedia:Max_Brooks|Max Brooks]], first appearing in ''[[Minecraft: The Mountain]]''.

== Appearance ==
Summer is heavily implied to look like [[Alex]].

== Personality ==
Someone who sometimes calls zombies Zeds, and is very brave and strong.

== Quotes ==
{{Quote|Gurgling zombies and snarling wolves lurk in the night, and they’re closing in. With nowhere to hide, the lone traveler flees up a mountain, trapped and out of options . . . until a mysterious figure arrives, fighting off the horde singlehandedly. The unexpected savior is Summer, a fellow castaway and master of survival in these frozen wastes.}}

== History ==
* ''[[Minecraft: The Mountain]]''
* ''[[Minecraft: The Mountain (map)|Minecraft: The Mountain]]'' tie-in map (mentioned)
